The table should have 7 rows each represents a day of the week and 4 columns : day of the week using this format : [ID - DAY] ID should be an increment number starting from 1 and DAY is day of the week, type of post : is it an image, a story, reel or carousel, the third column is the actual content idea, the last column is an example script for the content idea of the third column
